summary: When the son of a gun-wielding woman is murdered by neo-Nazi surf punks in the post-apocalyptic future, his Mama hunts them down for some bloodthirsty revenge.
cast: Gail Neely|Robert Harden|Barry Brenner|Dawn Wildsmith|Michael Sonye|Joel Hile|Ryan Fegley|Gene Mitchell|Tom Shell|Bobbie Bresee|Jordan Briers|Tom Demenkoff|John Williamette|Rand Hogen|Daniel Kong|Steve Reid|Terry Lee|Brian Krutoff|Ted Prior|Andrew Bick|Dawne Ellison|Bertha Dahl|Willa Reynolds|Eva Goodrich|Esther Lloyd|Tom Searle|Karan Hanson|Christina Garcia|Bernadette DiSanto|Sherry O'Connor|Ross Allman|Maurice E. title: Los surfistas nazis deben morir
